title: Pepperoni Pizza Dip
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°. Mix cream cheese, sour cream, Italian seasoning, and garlic powder until smooth. Spread in bottom of 9-inch pie plate. Spread pizza sauce over cream cheese layer. Top with pepperoni, bell pepper, olives, and mozzarella. Bake 20-25 minutes until bubbly. Serve with crackers or bread.
